util

Class Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Tree

  • public class Tree
extends java.lang.Object
    A Tree, that defines a possible Combination of Stats, an Item may have as well as well as the Dropchance of this Item.
    The possible Stats will be saved in SubTrees.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haeldeus

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int defaultAmount
      The amount, the possible default Bonus adds.
      private Stat defaultBonus
      A possible default Bonus, every Tree adds, despite what his children define.
      private double dropChance
      The chance, the Item drops with this Tree as mod.
      private SubTree left
      The SubTree, that defines the left Stat of this Tree.
      private SubTree middle
      The SubTree, that defines the possible middle Stat of this Tree.
      private java.lang.String name
      The Name of the Tree.
      private SubTree right
      The SubTree, that defines the possible right Stat of this Tree.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tree(java.lang.String name, SubTree left, SubTree middle, SubTree right, double dropChance)
      Creates a new Tree of the given Name with the given SubTrees lefts and right and the chance to drop dropChance.
      Tree(java.lang.String name, SubTree left, SubTree middle, SubTree right, Stat defaultBonus, int amount, double dropChance)
      Creates a new Tree of the given Name with the given SubTrees lefts and right and the chance to drop dropChance.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the amount, the possible defaultBonus adds.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The Name of the Tree.

      • left

        private SubTree left
        The SubTree, that defines the left Stat of this Tree.

      • middle

        private SubTree middle
        The SubTree, that defines the possible middle Stat of this Tree. This might be null, in case the Tree has only two or three Mods.

      • right

        private SubTree right
        The SubTree, that defines the possible right Stat of this Tree. This might be null, in case the Tree has only one Mod.

      • dropChance

        private double dropChance
        The chance, the Item drops with this Tree as mod.

      • defaultBonus

        private Stat defaultBonus
        A possible default Bonus, every Tree adds, despite what his children define.

      • defaultAmount

        private int defaultAmount
        The amount, the possible default Bonus adds.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tree

        public Tree(java.lang.String name,
            SubTree left,
            SubTree middle,
            SubTree right,
            double dropChance)
        Creates a new Tree of the given Name with the given SubTrees lefts and right and the chance to drop dropChance.
        Parameters:
        name - The Name of the Tree.
        left - The SubTree, that is the left Child of this Tree.
        middle - The SubTree, that is the middle Child of this Tree.
        right - The SubTree, that is the right Child of this Tree.
        dropChance - The Chance, that the Item drops with this MultiBonus.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Tree

        public Tree(java.lang.String name,
            SubTree left,
            SubTree middle,
            SubTree right,
            Stat defaultBonus,
            int amount,
            double dropChance)
        Creates a new Tree of the given Name with the given SubTrees lefts and right and the chance to drop dropChance.
        Parameters:
        name - The Name of the Tree.
        left - The SubTree, that is the left Child of this Tree.
        middle - The SubTree, that is the middle Child of this Tree.
        right - The SubTree, that is the right Child of this Tree.
        defaultBonus - The Stat, that is given as default for this Item.
        amount - The amount of Bonus, the default Bonus for this Item gives.
        dropChance - The Chance, that the Item drops with this MultiBonus.
        Since:
        1.0

        Returns the left SubTree of this Tree.

      • getMiddle

        public SubTree getMiddle()
        Returns the middle SubTree of this Tree.
        Might be null, if this Tree only has 1 or 2 Mods.
        Returns:
        middle.
        Since:
        1.0

        public double getDropChance()
        Returns the chance, the Item drops with this Mod.
        Returns:

        Since:
        1.0

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this Tree.
        Returns:

        Since:

      • getRight

        public SubTree getRight()
        Returns the right child of this Tree.
        Might be null, if this Tree has only 1 Mod.
        Returns:
        right.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDefaultBonus

        public Stat getDefaultBonus()
        Returns the possible Stat, this Tree adds on default.
        Might be null, if the Item has no default Bonus.
        Returns:
        defaultBonus.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Stat

      • getDefaultAmount

        public int getDefaultAmount()
        Returns the amount, the possible defaultBonus adds.
        Might be null, if the Item has no default Bonus.

        defaultAmount.
        Since:
        1.0
